entry.title: Thursday: A few flurries. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness this morning then a few flurries. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 4. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending overnight then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
